insert into qualification_certificates (id, organization_id, specialization_id, worker, position_id, number, start_date, end_date) values (#{id}, #{organization.id}, #{specialization.id}, #{worker}, #{position.id}, #{number}, #{startDate}, #{stopDate})
mapper.update: update qualification_certificates set organization_id = #{organization.id}, specialization_id = #{specialization.id}, worker = #{worker}, position_id = #{position.id}, number = #{number}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{stopDate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select q.id as id, q.worker as worker, q.number as number, q.start_date as start_date, q.end_date as end_date, org.id as org_id, org.name as org_name, spec.id as spec_id, spec.name as spec_name, p.id as p_id, p.name as p_name, f.id as f_id, f.name as f_name from qualification_certificates q join organizations org on org.id = q.organization_id join specializations spec on spec.id = q.specialization_id join positions p on p.id = q.position_id left join qualification_certificates_functions qf on qf.certificate_id = q.id left join functions f on f.id = qf.function_id
